Trade/Device Name(s): ADVIA Centaur HAV IgM ReadyPack Reagents
ADVIA Centaur HAV IgM ReadyPack Calibrators
ADVIA Centaur HAV IgM Quality Control Materials
Analyte(s): IgM antibody to hepatitis A virus
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ADVIA Centaur HAV IgM immunoassay to qualitatively detect IgM antibodies to hepatitis A virus in human serum or plasma
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative determination of IgM response to hepatitis A virus in serum or plasma, as an aid in diagnosis of acute or recent hepatitis A infection, using ADVIA Centaur systems
